item.title: Measuring our way to future success
item.description: Are our blinders keeping us from seeing new opportunities, and / or following our customers as they move on? The presentation looks at how we measure online activities, and if this is limiting our perspective.
item.content:encoded: Are our blinders keeping us from seeing new opportunities, and / or following our customers as they move on? The presentation looks at how we measure online activities, and if this is limiting our perspective.

item.title: Hands Per Device (HPD)
item.description: Hands-per-device, or HPD, is an alternative approach to efficiently designing interactive content and applications for a today’s multi-platform ecosystem.
item.content:encoded: Hands-per-device, or HPD, is an alternative approach to efficiently designing interactive content and applications for a today’s multi-platform ecosystem.

item.title: The Story of the Surf Rescue book: Irith's journey into UX Design.
item.description: This is a sketched story about the development of the Surf Rescue picture book. It is an example of my growing UX skills. Chapter Two is a sketched story of my UX Design experience to date.
item.content:encoded: This is a sketched story about the development of the Surf Rescue picture book. It is an example of my growing UX skills. Chapter Two is a sketched story of my UX Design experience to date.

item.title: Psychology of Social Media, by @AMP_Agency (psychofsocial@ampagency.com)
item.description: Presented by AMP Agency at FutureM on September 14,2011 >>>> To request a copy of the whitepaper, email us at psychofsocial@ampagency.com >>>> Event Description: Join AMP Agency for a look into the evolution of social media – where it is today, emerging technologies and channels, and what’s to come in the years of innovation ahead. The event will combine an exclusive first-look at findings from AMP’s latest research study, the “Psychology of Social”, and an in-depth panel discussion with leading social experts discussing “what’s next?” in social media. Panelists will explore topics such as “the various triggers that lead to successful consumer adoption of new social channels”, “predicting the future of social” and “how brands will need to adopt to achieve success in the future of social media marketing”.
item.content:encoded: Presented by AMP Agency at FutureM on September 14,2011 >>>> To request a copy of the whitepaper, email us at psychofsocial@ampagency.com >>>> Event Description: Join AMP Agency for a look into the evolution of social media – where it is today, emerging technologies and channels, and what’s to come in the years of innovation ahead. The event will combine an exclusive first-look at findings from AMP’s latest research study, the “Psychology of Social”, and an in-depth panel discussion with leading social experts discussing “what’s next?” in social media. Panelists will explore topics such as “the various triggers that lead to successful consumer adoption of new social channels”, “predicting the future of social” and “how brands will need to adopt to achieve success in the future of social media marketing”.
item.author: JamiePappas@slideshare.net(JamiePappas)

media:content.media:title: Psychology of Social Media, by @AMP_Agency (psychofsocial@ampagency.com)
media:content.media:description: Presented by AMP Agency at FutureM on September 14,2011 >>>> To request a copy of the whitepaper, email us at psychofsocial@ampagency.com >>>> Event Description: Join AMP Agency for a look into the evolution of social media – where it is today, emerging technologies and channels, and what’s to come in the years of innovation ahead. The event will combine an exclusive first-look at findings from AMP’s latest research study, the “Psychology of Social”, and an in-depth panel discussion with leading social experts discussing “what’s next?” in social media. Panelists will explore topics such as “the various triggers that lead to successful consumer adoption of new social channels”, “predicting the future of social” and “how brands will need to adopt to achieve success in the future of social media marketing”.
media:content.media:text: Presented by AMP Agency at FutureM on September 14,2011 >>>> To request a copy of the whitepaper, email us at psychofsocial@ampagency.com >>>> Event Description: Join AMP Agency for a look into the evolution of social media – where it is today, emerging technologies and channels, and what’s to come in the years of innovation ahead. The event will combine an exclusive first-look at findings from AMP’s latest research study, the “Psychology of Social”, and an in-depth panel discussion with leading social experts discussing “what’s next?” in social media. Panelists will explore topics such as “the various triggers that lead to successful consumer adoption of new social channels”, “predicting the future of social” and “how brands will need to adopt to achieve success in the future of social media marketing”.

Psychology of Social Media, by @AMP_Agency (psychofsocial@ampagency.com)
